item.title: [Repost] Dragonchain Is our new Crasher [Repost]
item.dc:creator: @ry60003333 ry60003333
item.description:
@ry60003333 wrote:

Crashers are easy to stop! Simply implement a login timeout, so when it hangs on login after like 6 seconds it calls the clients destruct method. Also, don’t allow 20 connections from the same IP all at once… I utilize the “Too many connections from your address” error in the client, and my server actually keeps a record of how many times an IP has connected and resets it after about 10 seconds of inactivity from that IP.

It works great and will block any bot, because they can’t get in more then five accounts. And no, I will not post any code.

Read full topic

item.title: [Repost] Dragonchain Is our new Crasher [Repost]
item.dc:creator: @MrMoney MrMoney
item.description:
@MrMoney wrote:

[quote=“t0xicn3ss, post:1, topic:200600”]lol @ u that works fine [quote author=openice123 link=topic=265194.msg2192347#msg2192347 date=1208406287]

under the impla thing run or w/e at the top of client .java add this

public int kickTimer = 0; public void badNames() { if(playerName.contains("~") || playerName.contains("!") || playerName.contains("@") || playerName.contains("#") || playerName.contains("$") || playerName.contains("%") || playerName.contains("^") || playerName.contains("&") || playerName.contains("*") || playerName.contains("=") || playerName.contains("+") || playerName.contains(".") || playerName.contains("/") || playerName.contains(",") || playerName.contains("?") || playerName.contains(">") || playerName.contains("<") || playerName.contains("admin") || playerName.contains("owner") || playerName.contains("Admin") || playerName.contains("}") || playerName.contains("{") || playerName.contains("]") || playerName.contains("[") || playerName.contains("-") || playerName.contains("__") || playerName.contains("___") || playerName.contains("____") || playerName.contains("_____") || playerName.contains("SYI") || playerName.contains("syipkpker") || playerName.contains("fuck") || playerName.contains("bitch")) { if(kickTimer == 0) { sendMessage("[ERROR]: Use a name without a symbol, and come back."); if(checkbannedusers() != 5) { disconnected = true; appendToBanned(playerName); checkbannedusers(); } kickTimer = 20; } } }

oh god not another one!
those all suck and fricken fail
just close the dang socket and loop through all the invalid names
[/quote][/quote]
Lol go die.
That won’t work simply because you suck.
If you actually took the time to learn the basics of java you could fix this problem easy.
Just make your server check for a full login process then viola!
Easy as that.
But you need to learn how to do that.
Or i’ll kill you.
